attributes.action: Stop knife crime and make Middlesbrough a safer place
attributes.additional_details: In the surrounding areas of 2 women on Redcar murdered, also a young lad shot dead due to gangs hanging round street carrying knives and guns. PLEASE MAKE THIS A SAFER PLACE FOR ALL OF US
attributes.background: Too many murders going on around there, Also mugging with too many gangs hanging around intimidating people, which people are scared to walk to the shop at night,more CCTV which need to be on as 90% of the CCTV don't work more policing on foot at night. Also warning  sign posts with fines stated £

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Policing in Middlesbrough is the responsibility of the Police and Crime Commissioner (PCC) for Cleveland. You can contact your PCC here: https://www.cleveland.pcc.police.uk/Contact/Contact-Us.aspx
